Generated Narrative: SearchParameter MedicationRequest-requestor.name

MedicationRequestRequestorNameSearchParameter

Parameter requestor.name:string

Searches for MedicationRequest based on the Practitioner's full or partial name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/MedicationRequest?requestor.name={name}

ResourceMedicationRequest
Expression(none)
Target ResourcesMedicationRequest
Multiples
  • multipleAnd: It's up to the server whether the parameter may repeat in order to specify multiple values that must all be true
  • multipleOr: It's up to the server whether the parameter can have multiple values (separated by comma) where at least one must be true

name: MedicationRequestRequestorNameSearchParameter
description: Searches for MedicationRequest based on the Practitioner's full or partial name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/MedicationRequest?requestor.name={name}
